description: [menuPass](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0045) has used [certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) in a macro to decode base64-encoded content contained in a dropper document attached to an email. The group has also used certutil -decode to decode files on the victimâ€™s machine when dropping [UPPERCUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0275).(Citation: Accenture Hogfish April 2018)(Citation: FireEye APT10 Sept 2018)

external_references.description: Accenture Security. (2018, April 23). Hogfish Redleaves Campaign. Retrieved July 2, 2018.
